item.title: Tragedy off Lampedusa island
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> An Italian Coast Guard boat carries rescued migrants into the port of Lampedusa on Thursday, October 3. According to the nation's coast guard, a boat carrying as many as 500 people capsized and caught fire off the Italian island of Lampedusa. Loading weather data ...
